column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=A few weeks ago , I flew in an airplane to visit my brother in Tampa , Florida , which is a thousand miles from me .
#text=I had bought my ticket six weeks earlier on the internet , and had packed my bags the night before .
#text=The weather in Tampa is very warm , so I packed all summer clothes even though it was still winter .

#text=On the day of my flight , I arrived early so that I would have time to go through the security line , where they made me take off my shoes and my belt , and put my bag through the x-ray machine .
#text=An airline worker made an announcement when it was time for us to board the flight .
#text=We went to our assigned seats , put our bags in the overhead compartments , and then buckled in .
#text=During the flight , I watched a movie on my Kindle and got a Coke zero from the flight attended .
#text=When the flight landed , my brother was waiting for me outside the airport .
